text: at are the treatments for mandibuloacral dysplasia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of mandibuloacral dysplasia:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Mandibuloacral dysostosis  - Genetic Testing Registry: Mandibuloacral dysplasia with type B lipodystrophy   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,m
